analytic.title: Brief Reports White Matter Microstructure in Idiopathic Craniocervical Dystonia

abstract.p: Background: Dystonias are hyperkinetic movement disorders characterized by involuntary muscle contractions resulting in abnormal torsional movements and

citation.rawString: Albanese A, Bhatia K, Bressman SB, et al. Phenomenology and classification of dystonia: a consensus update. Mov Disord 2013;28:863–873, doi: http://dx.doi.org/10.1002/mds.25475.
